Hello!

I build useful software and help others do the same

I am currently the Lead Backend developer at Drivy, a startup creating the leading european peer to peer car rental website. I'm also the tech advisor of Birdly, a startup building a very smart Slack Bot. Before that I worked both in France and the US for various startups, agencies or larger companies.

The rest of my time is spent giving classes (HEC, HETIC, Learn Assembly, FACE, 50 Partners Accademy and more), talking in meetups, contribute to open source , creating MOOCs (Git & Ruby), blogging or helping entrepreneurs get started with their projects.

You can reach me via @marcgg on Twitter, my LinkedIn account or my email "marcg.gauthier-at-gmail-dot-com". If you want to hire me, please check out this page before contacting me.

Marc-
